item.title: BÃ i 9 - Interface Trong Java - Báº¯t Buá»™c Pháº£i Hiá»ƒu
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video minh há»a nguá»“n: YTB Code Thu

1) Interface lÃ  gÃ¬?

  • LÃ  báº£n thiáº¿t káº¿ cho class, Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a cÃ¡c hÃ nh vi mÃ  class pháº£i thá»±c hiá»‡n
  • Chá»‰ chá»©a abstract methods vÃ  constants
  • Class implement interface pháº£i override táº¥t cáº£ methods

2) CÃ¡ch khai bÃ¡o vÃ  sá»­ dá»¥ng 

public interface Animal {
    // Constants (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  public static final)
    String TYPE = "Animal";
    
    // Abstract methods (máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  public abstract)
    void makeSound();
    void move();
}

class Dog implements Animal {
    @Override
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Woof!");
    }
    
    @Override
    public void move() {
        System.out.println("Running on 4 legs");
    }
}

3) Táº¡i sao cáº§n Interface?

  • Äáº¡t Ä‘Æ°á»£c 100% abstraction
  • Há»— trá»£ multiple inheritance
  • Loose coupling (giáº£m sá»± phá»¥ thuá»™c giá»¯a cÃ¡c class)
// Má»™t class cÃ³ thá»ƒ implement nhiá»u interface
public class Bird implements Flyable, Walkable {
    @Override
    public void fly() {
        System.out.println("Flying...");
    }
    
    @Override
    public void walk() {
        System.out.println("Walking...");
    }
}

4) Default Methods (Java 8+) 

public interface Vehicle {
    void start();
    
    // Default method cÃ³ implementation
    default void stop() {
        System.out.println("Vehicle stopping...");
    }
}

item.title: BÃ i 8 - Abstract Class Trong Java - QuÃ¡ Chi LÃ TRá»ªU TÆ¯á»¢NG
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video minh há»a nguá»“n: YTB Code Thu

1) Abstract Class lÃ  gÃ¬?

  • LÃ  class Ä‘Æ°á»£c khai bÃ¡o vá»›i tá»« khÃ³a abstract
  • KhÃ´ng thá»ƒ táº¡o instance trá»±c tiáº¿p tá»« abstract class
  • CÃ³ thá»ƒ chá»©a cáº£ abstract method vÃ  method thÆ°á»ng
  • ÄÆ°á»£c dÃ¹ng lÃ m base class cho cÃ¡c class khÃ¡c

2) Abstract Method

  • Method Ä‘Æ°á»£c khai bÃ¡o nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng cÃ³ implementation
  • CÃ¡c class con pháº£i override táº¥t cáº£ abstract methods
public abstract class Animal {
    // Abstract method - khÃ´ng cÃ³ implementation
    public abstract void makeSound();
    
    // Method thÆ°á»ng - cÃ³ implementation
    public void eat() {
        System.out.println("Eating...");
    }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    @Override
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Woof!");
    }
}

3) Äáº·c Ä‘iá»ƒm cá»§a Abstract Class

3.1. KhÃ´ng thá»ƒ táº¡o instance 

// Sai - khÃ´ng thá»ƒ táº¡o instance
Animal animal = new Animal();

// ÄÃºng - táº¡o instance tá»« class con
Animal animal = new Dog();

3.2. CÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ³ constructor 

public abstract class Shape {
    private String color;
    
    // Constructor trong abstract class
    public Shape(String color) {
        this.color = color;
    }
    
    public abstract double calculateArea();
}

class Circle extends Shape {
    private double radius;
    
    public Circle(String color, double radius) {
        super(color); // Gá»i constructor cá»§a abstract class
        this.radius = radius;
    }
    
    @Override
    public double calculateArea() {
        return Math.PI * radius * radius;
    }
}

3.3. CÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ³ fields vÃ  methods thÆ°á»ng 

public abstract class Database {
    protected String connectionString;
    
    // Method thÆ°á»ng
    public void connect() {
        System.out.println("Connecting to " + connectionString);
    }
    
    // Abstract method
    public abstract void query();
}

4) Khi nÃ o dÃ¹ng Abstract Class?

4.1. Template Method Pattern 

public abstract class Game {
    // Template method
    public final void play() {
        initialize();
        startPlay();
        endPlay();
    }
    
    // Hooks
    abstract void initialize();
    abstract void startPlay();
    abstract void endPlay();
}

4.2. Common Base Functionality 

public abstract class Vehicle {
    protected String brand;
    protected String model;
    
    public String getInfo() {
        return brand + " " + model;
    }
    
    abstract void start();
}

5) Abstract Class vs Interface

Abstract Class

  • CÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ³ fields khÃ´ng static vÃ  non-final
  • CÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ³ method implementation
  • Má»™t class chá»‰ extend Ä‘Æ°á»£c má»™t abstract class
  • CÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ³ constructor
  • Access modifiers Ä‘a dáº¡ng

Interface

  • Fields luÃ´n lÃ  static vÃ  final
  • Methods máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  abstract (Java 8+ cÃ³ default methods)
  • Má»™t class cÃ³ thá»ƒ implement nhiá»u interface
  • KhÃ´ng cÃ³ constructor
  • Methods luÃ´n lÃ  public

6) Best Practices

6.1. Sá»­ dá»¥ng Template Method Pattern 

public abstract class DataMiner {
    public final void mine() {
        openFile();
        extractData();
        parseData();
        closeFile();
    }
    
    abstract void extractData();
    abstract void parseData();
}

6.2. Cung cáº¥p implementation máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh 

public abstract class Logger {
    // Default implementation
    public void log(String message) {
        System.out.println("Default: " + message);
    }
    
    // Must be implemented
    abstract void logError(String error);
}

7) Káº¿t luáº­n & cáº£m nháº­n

  • Abstract class lÃ  cÃ´ng cá»¥ máº¡nh máº½ cho code tÃ¡i sá»­ dá»¥ng
  • Káº¿t há»£p tá»‘t vá»›i Template Method Pattern
  • Cáº§n cÃ¢n nháº¯c giá»¯a abstract class vÃ  interface

Tiáº¿p theo: Interface trong Java

item.title: BÃ i 7 - TÃ­nh Äa HÃ¬nh (Polymorphism) Trong Java
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video minh há»a nguá»“n: YTB Code Thu

1) Äa hÃ¬nh lÃ  gÃ¬?

Äa hÃ¬nh (Polymorphism) cho phÃ©p má»™t Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng cÃ³ nhiá»u “hÃ¬nh dáº¡ng” khÃ¡c nhau:

  • Má»™t method cÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ³ nhiá»u cÃ¡ch thá»±c hiá»‡n
  • Má»™t Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng cÃ³ thá»ƒ Ä‘Æ°á»£c xem nhÆ° nhiá»u kiá»ƒu khÃ¡c nhau

2) Compile-time Polymorphism (Method Overloading) 

public class Calculator {
    // CÃ¹ng tÃªn method, khÃ¡c tham sá»‘
    public int add(int a, int b) {
        return a + b;
    }
    
    public double add(double a, double b) {
        return a + b;
    }
    
    public int add(int a, int b, int c) {
        return a + b + c;
    }
}

3) Runtime Polymorphism (Method Overriding) 

class Animal {
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Some sound");
    }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    @Override
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Woof!");
    }
}

class Cat extends Animal {
    @Override
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Meow!");
    }
}

// Sá»­ dá»¥ng
Animal animal1 = new Dog(); // Äa hÃ¬nh
Animal animal2 = new Cat(); // Äa hÃ¬nh

animal1.makeSound(); // "Woof!"
animal2.makeSound(); // "Meow!"

4) Upcasting & Downcasting

4.1. Upcasting

Chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i tá»« class con lÃªn class cha (tá»± Ä‘á»™ng)

Dog dog = new Dog();
Animal animal = dog; // Upcasting

4.2. Downcasting

Chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i tá»« class cha xuá»‘ng class con (cáº§n kiá»ƒm tra)

Animal animal = new Dog();
if (animal instanceof Dog) {
    Dog dog = (Dog) animal; // Downcasting
    dog.bark();
}

5) Äa hÃ¬nh vá»›i Interface 

interface Playable {
    void play();
}

class Guitar implements Playable {
    @Override
    public void play() {
        System.out.println("Playing guitar...");
    }
}

class Piano implements Playable {
    @Override
    public void play() {
        System.out.println("Playing piano...");
    }
}

// Sá»­ dá»¥ng
Playable instrument1 = new Guitar();
Playable instrument2 = new Piano();

instrument1.play(); // "Playing guitar..."
instrument2.play(); // "Playing piano..."

6) Best Practices

6.1. Programming to Interface 

// Thay vÃ¬
ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();

// NÃªn dÃ¹ng
List<String> list = new ArrayList<>();

6.2. Sá»­ dá»¥ng @Override 

@Override // GiÃºp compiler kiá»ƒm tra
public void makeSound() {
    System.out.println("Woof!");
}

6.3. Kiá»ƒm tra type trÆ°á»›c khi cast 

if (obj instanceof Dog) {
    Dog dog = (Dog) obj;
} else {
    // Xá»­ lÃ½ trÆ°á»ng há»£p khÃ¡c
}

7) Káº¿t luáº­n & cáº£m nháº­n

  • Äa hÃ¬nh giÃºp code linh hoáº¡t, dá»… má»Ÿ rá»™ng
  • Káº¿t há»£p vá»›i interface táº¡o code loosely coupled
  • Cáº©n tháº­n vá»›i downcasting Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh lá»—i runtime

Tiáº¿p theo: Abstract Class trong Java

item.title: BÃ i 6 - TÃ­nh ÄÃ³ng GÃ³i (Encapsulation) vs Hackers
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video minh há»a nguá»“n: YTB Code Thu

1) TÃ­nh Ä‘Ã³ng gÃ³i lÃ  gÃ¬?

ÄÃ³ng gÃ³i (Encapsulation) lÃ  viá»‡c:

  • GÃ³i dá»¯ liá»‡u vÃ  phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c xá»­ lÃ½ vÃ o má»™t Ä‘Æ¡n vá»‹ (class)
  • Giáº¥u chi tiáº¿t triá»ƒn khai, chá»‰ cÃ´ng khai nhá»¯ng gÃ¬ cáº§n thiáº¿t
  • Kiá»ƒm soÃ¡t quyá»n truy cáº­p vÃ o dá»¯ liá»‡u thÃ´ng qua cÃ¡c method

2) Access Modifiers trong Java

2.1. private

  • Chá»‰ truy cáº­p Ä‘Æ°á»£c trong cÃ¹ng class
public class BankAccount {
    private double balance; // Chá»‰ truy cáº­p trong class
    
    private void updateBalance(double amount) {
        balance += amount;
    }
}

2.2. protected

  • Truy cáº­p Ä‘Æ°á»£c trong cÃ¹ng package vÃ  cÃ¡c class con
public class Animal {
    protected String name; // Truy cáº­p trong package vÃ  class con
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    void setName(String newName) {
        name = newName; // OK vÃ¬ lÃ  class con
    }
}

2.3. public

  • Truy cáº­p Ä‘Æ°á»£c tá»« má»i nÆ¡i
public class User {
    public String username; // KhÃ´ng nÃªn public trá»±c tiáº¿p
    
    public void login() { // Method cÃ´ng khai
        System.out.println("Logging in...");
    }
}

2.4. default (package-private)

  • Truy cáº­p Ä‘Æ°á»£c trong cÃ¹ng package
class Helper { // KhÃ´ng cÃ³ modifier = default
    void helperMethod() {
        // Chá»‰ dÃ¹ng trong package
    }
}

3) Getter vÃ  Setter

Kiá»ƒm soÃ¡t truy cáº­p thÃ´ng qua method:

public class Student {
    private String name;
    private int age;
    
    // Getter
    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }
    
    // Setter vá»›i validation
    public void setAge(int age) {
        if (age > 0 && age < 150) {
            this.age = age;
        } else {
            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid age");
        }
    }
}

4) Lá»£i Ã­ch cá»§a Ä‘Ã³ng gÃ³i

  1. Báº£o máº­t dá»¯ liá»‡u

    • NgÄƒn truy cáº­p trá»±c tiáº¿p
    • Kiá»ƒm soÃ¡t thÃ´ng qua method

  2. Linh hoáº¡t trong thay Ä‘á»•i

    public class User {
    private String name;
    // CÃ³ thá»ƒ thay Ä‘á»•i cÃ¡ch lÆ°u name mÃ  khÃ´ng áº£nh hÆ°á»Ÿng code bÃªn ngoÃ i
    public String getName() {
        return name.toUpperCase(); // ThÃªm xá»­ lÃ½
    }
}

  3. Dá»… báº£o trÃ¬

    • Code gá»n gÃ ng, cÃ³ tá»• chá»©c
    • Dá»… debug vÃ  sá»­a lá»—i

5) Best Practices

5.1. LuÃ´n Ä‘Ã³ng gÃ³i dá»¯ liá»‡u 

// KhÃ´ng tá»‘t
public class Bad {
    public String data;
}

// Tá»‘t
public class Good {
    private String data;
    public String getData() {
        return data;
    }
}

5.2. Validation trong setter 

public void setPassword(String password) {
    if (password == null || password.length() < 6) {
        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid password");
    }
    this.password = password;
}

5.3. Immutable khi cÃ³ thá»ƒ 

public final class ImmutablePoint {
    private final int x;
    private final int y;
    
    public ImmutablePoint(int x, int y) {
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
    }
    
    // Chá»‰ cÃ³ getter, khÃ´ng cÃ³ setter
    public int getX() { return x; }
    public int getY() { return y; }
}

6) Káº¿t luáº­n & cáº£m nháº­n

  • ÄÃ³ng gÃ³i lÃ  ná»n táº£ng cho code an toÃ n, dá»… báº£o trÃ¬
  • LuÃ´n cÃ¢n nháº¯c access level phÃ¹ há»£p cho tá»«ng thÃ nh pháº§n
  • Getter/Setter khÃ´ng chá»‰ lÃ  boilerplate code mÃ  cÃ²n lÃ  cÆ¡ cháº¿ báº£o vá»‡ dá»¯ liá»‡u

item.title: BÃ i 5 - Thá»‘ng Trá»‹ TÃ­nh Káº¿ Thá»«a (Inheritance) Trong Java
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video minh há»a nguá»“n: YTB Code Thu

1) Káº¿ thá»«a lÃ  gÃ¬?

Káº¿ thá»«a lÃ  cÆ¡ cháº¿ cho phÃ©p má»™t class (subclass) káº¿ thá»«a cÃ¡c thuá»™c tÃ­nh vÃ  phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c tá»« má»™t class khÃ¡c (superclass).

2) CÃº phÃ¡p káº¿ thá»«a 

class Animal {
    protected String name;
    
    public void eat() {
        System.out.println(name + " is eating");
    }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    public void bark() {
        System.out.println(name + " says: Woof!");
    }
}

3) CÃ¡c loáº¡i káº¿ thá»«a

3.1. Single Inheritance

Má»™t class káº¿ thá»«a tá»« má»™t class duy nháº¥t.

class A {}
class B extends A {}

3.2. Multilevel Inheritance

Káº¿ thá»«a nhiá»u cáº¥p.

class Animal {}
class Mammal extends Animal {}
class Dog extends Mammal {}

3.3. Hierarchical Inheritance

Nhiá»u class cÃ¹ng káº¿ thá»«a tá»« má»™t class.

class Animal {}
class Dog extends Animal {}
class Cat extends Animal {}

4) Method Overriding

Con cÃ³ thá»ƒ ghi Ä‘Ã¨ phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c cá»§a cha.

class Animal {
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Some sound");
    }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    @Override
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Woof!");
    }
}

5) Tá»« khÃ³a final

  • NgÄƒn káº¿ thá»«a: final class
  • NgÄƒn override: final method
final class Constants {
    // KhÃ´ng thá»ƒ káº¿ thá»«a tá»« class nÃ y
}

class Animal {
    final void breathe() {
        // KhÃ´ng thá»ƒ override phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c nÃ y
    }
}

6) Best Practices

6.1. Composition over Inheritance

Æ¯u tiÃªn dÃ¹ng composition khi cÃ³ thá»ƒ.

// Inheritance
class ElectricCar extends Car {}

// Composition (better)
class Car {
    private Engine engine;
}

6.2. Programming to Interface 

// Instead of
Dog dog = new Dog();

// Better
Animal dog = new Dog();

6.3. Liskov Substitution Principle

Class con pháº£i cÃ³ thá»ƒ thay tháº¿ class cha mÃ  khÃ´ng gÃ¢y lá»—i.

7) Nhá»¯ng Ä‘iá»u cáº§n trÃ¡nh

  1. Káº¿ thá»«a quÃ¡ nhiá»u táº§ng
  2. Override method mÃ  khÃ´ng giá»¯ Ä‘Ãºng tÃ­nh cháº¥t cá»§a lá»›p cha
  3. Láº¡m dá»¥ng káº¿ thá»«a khi khÃ´ng cáº§n thiáº¿t

8) Káº¿t luáº­n & cáº£m nháº­n

  • Káº¿ thá»«a lÃ  cÃ´ng cá»¥ máº¡nh máº½ nhÆ°ng cáº§n dÃ¹ng Ä‘Ãºng chá»—
  • Æ¯u tiÃªn composition trong nhiá»u trÆ°á»ng há»£p
  • TuÃ¢n thá»§ SOLID principles khi thiáº¿t káº¿ káº¿ thá»«a

item.title: BÃ i 4 - Láº­p TrÃ¬nh HÆ°á»›ng Äá»‘i TÆ°á»£ng (OOP) trong Java
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:

1) OOP lÃ  gÃ¬?

Láº­p trÃ¬nh hÆ°á»›ng Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng (Object-Oriented Programming) lÃ  phÆ°Æ¡ng phÃ¡p láº­p trÃ¬nh:

2) 4 Trá»¥ cá»™t cá»§a OOP

  • Che giáº¥u chi tiáº¿t bÃªn trong, chá»‰ cÃ´ng khai nhá»¯ng gÃ¬ cáº§n thiáº¿t
public class BankAccount {
    private double balance; // Thuá»™c tÃ­nh private
    
    public void deposit(double amount) { // Method public

            balance += amount;

2.2. TÃ­nh káº¿ thá»«a (Inheritance)

  • Class con káº¿ thá»«a thuá»™c tÃ­nh vÃ  phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c tá»« class cha
  • TÃ¡i sá»­ dá»¥ng vÃ  má»Ÿ rá»™ng code
class Animal {

    public void eat() {
        System.out.println("Eating...");
    }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
    public void bark() {
        System.out.println("Woof!");

2.3. TÃ­nh Ä‘a hÃ¬nh (Polymorphism)

  • Má»™t hÃ nh Ä‘á»™ng cÃ³ thá»ƒ thá»±c hiá»‡n theo nhiá»u cÃ¡ch khÃ¡c nhau
  • Overriding vÃ  Overloading
class Animal {
    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Some sound");
    }
}

    public void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Woof!");

2.4. TÃ­nh trá»«u tÆ°á»£ng (Abstraction)

  • Sá»­ dá»¥ng abstract class vÃ  interface

3) Æ¯u Ä‘iá»ƒm cá»§a OOP

  2. TÃ¡i sá»­ dá»¥ng code hiá»‡u quáº£
  3. Báº£o máº­t tá»‘t hÆ¡n nhá» tÃ­nh Ä‘Ã³ng gÃ³i

4) Best Practices trong OOP

  2. Æ¯u tiÃªn composition over inheritance

5) Káº¿t luáº­n & cáº£m nháº­n

  • OOP giÃºp tá»• chá»©c code theo cÃ¡ch tá»± nhiÃªn, dá»… hiá»ƒu
  • 4 trá»¥ cá»™t OOP lÃ  ná»n táº£ng cho thiáº¿t káº¿ pháº§n má»m tá»‘t
  • Cáº§n thá»i gian thá»±c hÃ nh Ä‘á»ƒ náº¯m vá»¯ng vÃ  Ã¡p dá»¥ng hiá»‡u quáº£

Tiáº¿p theo: TÃ­nh Káº¿ thá»«a trong Java
